user.title: EON Energia Login
user.description:
To connect your EON Energia account:

1. **Copy** this URL and open it in a new browser tab:

`{auth_url}`

2. Log in with your EON Energia credentials
3. After login, the browser will try to open an app and show an error - **this is expected!**
4. Open your browser's **Developer Tools** (press F12 or Cmd+Option+I on Mac)
5. Look in the **Console** tab for an error like: `Failed to launch 'com.eon-energia.eon.auth0://...'`
6. **Right-click** on the URL and select "Copy link address" to copy the entire URL, then paste it below

select_pod.title: Select Point of Delivery
select_pod.description: Select the electricity meter (POD) you want to monitor.

select_tariff.title: Select Tariff Type
select_tariff.description: Select your electricity tariff type. Monoraria has a single rate, while Bioraria/Multioraria has different rates for peak (F1), mid-peak (F2), and off-peak (F3) hours.
